store.desc:
All in one app for your PS4. Payload Sender and a brand new Store for your PS4! Download Payloads, Homebrew, Applications for your phone and more! Everything straight from your phone!

Features
- Payloads, homebrew and applications store
- Payload sender
- Jailbreak firmware checker
- Trusted developers
- Customizable with 3 themes and 20 secondary colors
- More features to come!
store.title: PS Tools 1.0

store.desc:
Send payloads to your PS4 straight from your phone!

What's new?
- New UI
- Recoded
- New Setup Wizard
- Optional Product sans font
- Settings are now automatically applied
Full changelog in Settings > Changelog
store.title: PS4 Payload Sender 4.0

store.desc:
Use your favorite FTP client to remotely edit files of your 5.05 PS4

How to use :
When you send the FTP payload you will receive a notification on your PS4 with the IP address and Port (Usually 1337) for your FTP client

**NOTICE**
For 5.05 ONLY, it is download as a .zip file. You need to extract the ps4-ftp-vtx.bin file (located in the /payload folder of the zip file) to send it as a payload!
store.title: FTP for 5.05

store.desc: Unlock the PS4 internet browser on firmware 4.74
store.title: Unlock web browser for 4.74

store.desc:
Lotus Menu is a native-based modmenu for PlayStation 4, run on the 2much4u menu base. It features various unique options such as meteor rain, clear water, vehicle preview and more. Most DLC content is supported.

The menu is designed to be a easy to use, Rockstar-like menu. It can be switched to both the left and right side of the screen.

For GTA V version 1.27
store.title: GTA V Lotus mod menu

store.desc: This is for GTA V 1.00 on firmware 4.55 Open the mod menu with L1 + R1
store.title: GTA V ArabicGuy 1.0 for 4.55

store.desc:
ArabicGuy updated for 5.05 firmware. Works on GTA V 1.00 Press L1+R1 to open mod menu

**EXTRACT BEFORE USE**
This is downloaded as a zip. You will need to unzip it before using it!
store.title: GTA V ArabicGuy 1.1 for 5.05
